class.name: Vector2Array
class.description: An Array specifically designed to hold Vector2.

method.name: Vector2Array
method.description: Construct a new [Vector2Array]. Optionally, you can pass in an Array that will be converted.

method.name: resize
method.description: Set the size of the Vector2Array. If larger than the current size it will reserve some space beforehand, and if it is smaller it will cut off the array.

method.name: set
method.description: Change the [Vector2] at the given index.

method.name: size
method.description: Return the size of the array.
